synopsis:
He is a mute and paralysis who has been abandoned by family. She doesn't care about the ridicule of the world and has cooperated with him in a nominal marriage.
It was discovered after the marriage that he was a WOLF with goat's skin. 
Dare to say that he is a dog? That will pay the price!
He says: "Do you know what the dog's characteristics are? Be brave, loyal, and... always hungry!"

(Source: Official Youtube Video)
